textBeforeTable: Z1R Helmets Sizing information is provided by the manufacturer and does not guarantee a perfect fit. Womens Jacket Men's Leather Chaps Sizing Mens Jacket Women's Leather Chaps Sizing Z1R Helmets 1. Total Measure of Bust at Largest Point 2. Measure Under Armpit Across Breasts at Largest Point 3. Keep Tape Measure Paralell with Floor To Measure Bust 1. Measure Total Circumference of Chest at Largest Point. 2. Under Armpit / Across Breast with Arms Rlaxed 3. Keep Tape Paralell with Floor To Measure Chest: 1. Relax Arm at Side 2. Begin at Neck Bone 3. Measure Over Shoulder and Elbow point 4. Finish at Wrist Bone To Measure Sleeve: We highly recommend finding a cloth tape measure and taking the time to take these measurements.  Z1R sizes will not necessarily correlate with fitment in other brands.
